Activity.5: -        Check chillers and complete report entry 1
Activity.6: -        Check ice level and decide if action needed
Activity.8: Report any absence to Matt Tobias
Activity.10: -        Check photo booth staff have arrived and are ready for opening
Activity.11: -        Perform check of all skates (assign to staff)
Activity.12: -        Conduct rink walk round with ice marshals after covers are removed
Activity.13: -        Ensure skate exchange areas are clean and clear (assign to staff)
Activity.16: o    Raise or review and concerns or issues
Activity.17: o    Assign roles and hand out scanners and radios
Activity.19: o    Review and assign ice guide bookings
Activity.20: -        Establish contact with ticket office via radio
Activity.22: Send pre-opening status email to IMG operations manager
Activity.25: Resurface ice (no cutting, just lay water)
Activity.26: -        As staff to clean and clear skate exchange
Activity.27: -        Conduct 5-minute staff debrief and dismiss staff
Activity.28: -        Perform final chiller check and enter data in to report
Activity.30: -        Review pre-booked session numbers for tomorrow
Activity.31: -        Submit Duty Manager’s Report to the IMG Operations Manager
Activity.32: -        Ensure external cabins and structures are secured and area is clear
Activity.33: Crew to roll out ice rink cover
